MissFortune.name: ºMiss Fortuneº
MissFortune.title: ºøthe Bounty Hunterº
MissFortune.lore:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøFor those who brave the harsh seas of Runeterra, attaining one's own ship and crew is the pinnacle of success. Sarah Fortune, a well-respected (some would say legendary) bounty hunter from Bilgewater, was able to achieve this feat just after her sixteenth birthday, etching out her name as the go-to gal for resolving special troubles. No bounty was too difficult or too dangerous for her feminine charm and her renowned use of her twin pistols, ''Shock and Awe''. Her success gave her the means to legitimately purchase her own ship... with a little flirtatious haggling, of course. Things weren't always so fortunate for Miss Fortune, though. When she was young, trade ships began to dot the horizon of her quiet home in the northern shores of Blue Flame Island's largest chunk. Trade routes brought piracy, and the inhabitants soon found themselves caught in a frenzy of pillage.øºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºOne day, young Sarah returned home to hear gunshots and screaming. Her front door was smashed open; inside, she saw her mother lying in a pool of blood. A sudden blow to her head made her collapse next to her slain mother. The last thing she could remember were her attacker's red eyes, as his face was blocked by a rogue's bandana. Miss Fortune has a strong distrust for pirates and she finds herself constantly bickering with the infamous Gangplank (the only captain to resist her charms) over the direction of Bilgewater politics. Her two goals: to unite the people of Bilgewater, making them into a strong and independent society, and to find the pirate who killed her mother. To that end, she has entered the League of Legends as a champion, trading her skills for the wealth and influence that will help her accomplish both.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
MissFortune.blurb: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøFor those who brave the harsh seas of Runeterra, attaining one's own ship and crew is the pinnacle of success. Sarah Fortune, a well-respected (some would say ...
allytips: ºøºøºøºøºøMiss Fortune ramps up speed if she isn't attacked by an enemy target. Avoid getting hit to move very fast.ºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøUse Double Up on the furthest enemy minion if enemy champions are hiding in back; it will bounce to them for lots of damage.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøDouble Up applies On-Hit effects, making items like Frozen Mallet and Bloodthirster very effective.øºøºøºøºøº
enemytips: ºøºøºøºøMiss Fortune's speed boost is removed if she is damaged or debuffed by an enemy.øºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøMiss Fortune is easy to kill if you can reach her; target her first in team fights.ºøºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºDouble Upº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøMiss Fortune fires a bullet at an enemy, damaging them and a target behind them.øºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøºøMiss Fortune fires a shot at an enemy target, dealing ºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}ºø) physical damage and øº{{ e2 }}ºøºøºøºø% of that damage to another enemy target behind the first. Applies on-hit effects.øºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºImpure Shotsº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºMiss Fortune passively increases damage dealt to a target with each strike.  This ability can be activated to increase Miss Fortune's Attack Speed and cause her attacks to lower healing received by the target.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºPassive:ººø Miss Fortune deals øº{{ e1 }} (+º{{ a1 }})ºøºøºøºø magic damage to her target with each attack, cumulatively stacking up to ºøºøºøº{{ e4 }}ºø times on the same target.ºøº
ºøMaximum bonus damage: øº{{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }})

ºActive: ººøºøMiss Fortune's Attack Speed is increased by ºøºøº{{ e2 }}ºøºøºøºøºøºø% for 6 seconds and causes her attacks to lower healing received and health regeneration of the target by 50% for 3 seconds.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºMake It Rainº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºMiss Fortune unleashes a flurry of bullets at a location, dealing waves of damage to opponents and slowing them.ºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøºøºøºøºMiss Fortune fires hundreds of bullets into the air that rain down at a location after 0.5 seconds, dealing ºøºøºøºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºøºø magic damage over 2 seconds and slowing enemies hit by ºøºøº{{ e2 }}ºø% for 1 second.º

spells.name: ºBullet Timeº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøMiss Fortune channels a flurry of bullets into a cone in front of her, dealing large amounts of damage to enemies.ºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøºøºøºøMiss Fortune channels a barrage of bullets into a cone in front of her for 2 seconds, dealing ºøºøºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }})ºøº physical damage per bullet.ºøº

passive.name: Strutº
passive.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøAfter 5 seconds of not being attacked, Miss Fortune gains an additional 25 Movement Speed. This bonus increases by 9 each second up to a maximum bonus of 70.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
